    • Constructor Detail

      • Screen

        public Screen(String resolution,
              int refreshRate,
              int responseTime)
        Creates a screen given a resolution, refresh rate, and response time.
        Parameters:
        resolution - The screen's resolution in the form of "{width}x{height}"
        refreshRate - The screen's refresh rate, in hertz.
        responseTime - The screen's response time in milliseconds.
